title: Microsoft Office and a host of training resources — just $50
description:
Microsoft Office has been the world’s leading office software for decades for good reason. But with more budget-friendly alternatives out there, you may have strayed away for a while. Now’s a great time to lock down the best in the business because we’re offering a lifetime subscription to Microsoft Office Pro 2021 (and more) for just $49.99.

Office Pro 2021 for Windows includes Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Outlook, Teams, OneNote, Publisher, and Access. It’s a complete suite to help you do your best work and it has
